content.question: Which of the following is an implication of the chart?

choices.label: The Nigerian independent election commission will continue to fail to reduce voter fraud in elections.
Civil society does not exist in Nigeria to challenge corrupt politicians.
Nigerian citizens are critical of Nigerian politicians and have low levels of political trust.
The courts are ineffective in addressing the needs of Islamic citizens in the north.

content.answer: Nigerian citizens are critical of Nigerian politicians and have low levels of political trust.

unit.text: 5: Political and Economic Changes and Development

topic.text: 5.8: Causes and Effects of Demographic Change

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain what the data implies or illustrates about political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
